stories.text:
hey friends, I've been working in marketing for like 9 years and right now marketing hiring became really tough:

- less skilled candidates - less candidates who wants to work in a fast-moving startup - strong competition for talent

I feel like I almost need to run after good candidate and send him/her gifts Is it the same on your end?
stories.title: Ask HN: Hoooooow to Hire Marketing Team?

stories.text:
I'm trying to find out if there are any organisations or trusts that would donate funds purely based on a philanthropist nature if convinced. E.g SoftBank

Speaking to activist on a subreddit advocating for a cure to HSV-1/HSV-2. The virus has been linked to Alzheimer's and other degenerative diseases and is one of the leading causes of suicide in the young because of stigma.

There seems to be promising work being done in the field namely by Dr. Keith Jerome and Fred Hutch and a Chinese Pharmaceutical company BD Gene.

But it seems the group needs lobbying power and the pharmaceuticals also need funding, how best would you think to address this issue?

stories.text:
If you have experience with social media account recovery I'm offering a paid side gig to get an Instagram account back from a brute force attack.

Please email kasani.music@gmail.com to apply.
